chunks.zh: 拔过智齿的老哥，疼吗
chunks.en: Experienced folks who have had wisdom teeth extracted, does it hurt?

chunks.zh: 拔过智齿的老哥，疼吗？
chunks.en: Experienced folks who have had wisdom teeth extracted, does it hurt?

chunks.zh: 最近智齿经常发炎，想去掉，咨询下
chunks.en: My wisdom teeth have been frequently inflamed recently, and I want to get them removed. Seeking advice.

chunks.zh: 我说不疼你又不信
chunks.en: You wouldn't believe me if I said it doesn't hurt.

chunks.zh: 发炎期间似乎不能拔牙
chunks.en: It seems you can't extract teeth during inflammation.

chunks.zh: 我四颗智齿长齐了 都阻生 都需要拔掉
chunks.en: All four of my wisdom teeth have grown in, and they are all impacted, so they all need to be extracted.

chunks.zh: 不疼，嘶。。。
chunks.en: Doesn't hurt, hiss... (sound of slight discomfort)

chunks.zh: 疼是次要的，主要是注意，千万不要诱发干槽症，不然有你受的
chunks.en: The pain is secondary, the main thing is to be careful not to induce dry socket, or you'll suffer.

chunks.zh: 备好洛索洛芬钠片，疼就来一片
chunks.en: Prepare some Loxoprofen Sodium tablets, take one when it hurts.

chunks.zh: 疼
chunks.en: It hurts.

chunks.zh: 哎，我也是，可能也得去了
chunks.en: Sigh, me too, I probably have to go as well.

chunks.zh: 疼倒是不疼，就是差一点憋死。
chunks.en: It doesn't hurt, but I almost suffocated.

chunks.zh: 拔完智齿医生会忘那个口塞一个棉花球让你咬，但是嘴里有很多口水，就会想一直咽，咽着咽着一不小心，咬的那个棉花球就随着动作堵嗓子眼了
chunks.en: After the wisdom tooth extraction, the doctor will forget to put a cotton ball in the socket for you to bite on, but there's a lot of saliva in your mouth, so you'll want to keep swallowing. While swallowing, if you're not careful, the cotton ball you're biting on will accidentally block your throat.

chunks.zh: 不疼~四顆智齒記得分開來拔，每周拔一次~一點都不疼~
chunks.en: Doesn't hurt~ Remember to extract the four wisdom teeth separately, once a week~ Doesn't hurt at all~

chunks.zh: 去正规医院，不疼。
chunks.en: Go to a reputable hospital, it doesn't hurt.

chunks.zh: 2 星期一个，2 个月拔完 4 个，发炎时期不能拔会有严重感染风险，然后如果智齿是阻生或畸形，一定挂个主任
chunks.en: One every 2 weeks, 4 extracted in 2 months. You can't extract when it's inflamed, there's a risk of serious infection. And if the wisdom tooth is impacted or malformed, definitely see a chief physician.

chunks.zh: 无感，上午拔完下午火锅
chunks.en: No feeling, extracted in the morning, hotpot in the afternoon.

chunks.zh: 看你的智齿好拔不了，发炎的时候拔不了，我当时牙床上来了一刀子，缝针，麻药过劲后疼，但是忍受范围内，睡觉时有吃止疼片。
chunks.en: It depends on whether your wisdom teeth are easy to extract. You can't extract them when they're inflamed. I had a cut on my gum at the time, stitches, and it hurt after the anesthesia wore off, but it was within tolerance. I took painkillers when sleeping.

chunks.zh: 疼了大概 3 天？
chunks.en: It hurt for about 3 days?

chunks.zh: 医生只让吃流质。。。但是我买了很软的面包，直接塞进嗓子眼（不好，还是别学我），不咀嚼。
chunks.en: The doctor only allowed liquid food... but I bought very soft bread and stuffed it directly into my throat (bad, don't follow my example), without chewing.

chunks.zh: 一周内不能抽烟喝酒。
chunks.en: No smoking or drinking for a week.

chunks.zh: 去年拔了，也因为老发炎。
chunks.en: I had mine extracted last year, also because they were always inflamed.

chunks.zh: 要先看你的智齿长的咋样，如果歪的估计有点难搞。
chunks.en: You need to see how your wisdom teeth are growing first. If they are crooked, it might be a bit difficult.

chunks.zh: 拔的时候打麻醉不疼，麻醉过了有一点点疼，还行能忍。
chunks.en: It doesn't hurt during extraction with anesthesia, after the anesthesia wears off it's a little bit painful, but it's bearable.

chunks.zh: 我拔 2 个一点都不疼，不知道是不是医生问题
chunks.en: I extracted 2 and it didn't hurt at all, I don't know if it's a doctor's issue.

chunks.zh: 感觉真得看你的智齿长的好不好拔，我的正常方向，所以当时拔牙的时候医生很轻松的就拔出来了，如果方向不对那就吃力了……
chunks.en: I feel like it really depends on whether your wisdom teeth are easy to extract. Mine were in a normal direction, so the doctor extracted them very easily. If the direction is wrong, then it will be difficult...

chunks.zh: 一、不要去私立医院，去公立三甲医院，因为其实拔智齿有可能会死人的。
chunks.en: First, don't go to private hospitals, go to public Class A tertiary hospitals, because people can actually die from wisdom tooth extraction.

chunks.zh: 二、拔的时候疼不疼看医生麻醉药的量。（还有自己的紧张心情会放大疼痛感）
chunks.en: Second, whether it hurts during extraction depends on the amount of anesthetic the doctor uses. (Also, your own nervousness can amplify the pain).

chunks.zh: 三、拔完后麻醉药过后会有一段时间的脸肿和疼痛。
chunks.en: Third, after the anesthetic wears off after extraction, there will be a period of facial swelling and pain.

chunks.zh: 因人而异，真的看体质（医生说我比较耐疼）。
chunks.en: It varies from person to person, it really depends on your constitution (the doctor said I have a high pain tolerance).

chunks.zh: 反正我一天时间，拔了俩，还补了个牙。
chunks.en: Anyway, in one day, I extracted two and also filled a cavity.

chunks.zh: 除了张嘴太久，嘴角撕裂有点疼，别的没啥。
chunks.en: Other than the corner of my mouth tearing a bit from opening my mouth for too long, there's nothing else.

chunks.zh: 拔牙缝线就晚上躺下睡觉的时候有一点点勒肉的痛感（明显感知到但绝对可以轻松忍受的那种）。
chunks.en: The stitches from the tooth extraction only have a slight, meat-cutting pain when I lie down to sleep at night (clearly perceptible but definitely easily tolerable).

chunks.zh: 拔得时候不疼   当天晚上肯定会疼的。
chunks.en: It doesn't hurt when it's extracted, but it will definitely hurt that night.

chunks.zh: 拔的时候会注射麻药，不疼的。
chunks.en: They'll inject anesthetic when extracting, it doesn't hurt.

chunks.zh: 拔之后因人而异，看创口大小，肯定会肿的，肿得厉害就会疼。
chunks.en: After extraction, it varies from person to person, depending on the size of the wound. It will definitely be swollen, and if it's severely swollen, it will hurt.
